1.title: My Ranch, My Rules

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Steve Austin invites eight badasses in the country to battle head to head on his ranch. The last man standing takes on the Skullbuster obstacle course for a chance to win $10,000.

2.title: Didn't Even Break a Nail

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Steve welcomes his first eight women to the ranch to compete in head to head competition. They'll face Trench Warfare, the Pulverizer and the Junkyard to earn the right to take on Steve's Skullbuster and a chance at $10,000.

3.title: Beards and Brawn

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: The power of the beards invade the Broken Skull Challenge. Eight tough as nails male athletes compete in Snatch, Stacked and Chained up. Iron Workers, Personal Bodyguards and MMA Fighters, will all battle to earn the right to take on Steve's personal obstacle course, the Skullbuster and a shot at $10,000. It's going to take more than "Beards and Brawn" to take Steve's money.

4.title: Boom or Bust

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Eight new women come to the Broken Skull Challenge with hopes of being the first woman to beat Steve Austin's Skullbuster and take his $10,000. However it won't be easy, as they will have to go through three rounds of bust ass competition facing the likes of Snatch, Stacked and Chained Up.

5.title: Locked and Loaded

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Fresh meat battle head to head at the Broken Skull Challenge as eight new men try and prove they are the toughest badass in the country. They'll go through Possession, Loaded and the Grip & Rip. The winner moves on to face the Skullbuster for a chance to win $10,000.

6.title: The Good, the Bad and the Crazy

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Steve Austin invites eight new women to his ranch to fight head to head in Possession, Loaded and Grip & Rip. Only one will survive and earn the right to take on Steve's personal obstacle course, the Skullbuster, and a shot at $10,000.

7.title: Welcome to the Gun Show

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Eight new male competitors go through three grueling rounds of competition, including Drag Race, Bagged, and Blowout . One of them will earn the right to take on the Skullbuster, and a chance at $10,000.

8.title: Looks Can Be Deceiving

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Steve's brought in the toughest women yet to his Broken Skull Challenge, as they compete head to head in Drag Race, Bagged and Blowout. Only one of them will earn them the right to take on his Skullbuster and a shot at his $10,000.

9.title: Last Man Standing

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: The last group of elite male athletes comes to Steve Austin's ranch in search of the $10,000 prize. After battling through Trench Warfare, Pain Train and Barreled, only one will have a shot at the Skullbuster.

10.title: You Lose, You Leave

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: It's the final episode and Steve Austin has saved his best for last. Eight more women arrive at the ranch with dreams of taking down the Skullbuster and the $10,000 grand prize. But before they make it that far, they'll have to go through Trench Warfare, Pain Train and Barreled.

1.title: Welcome Back to Hell

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Eight male competitors taking on three new challenges: Summit, Tired and Excalibur. Later, the one man standing takes on the new Skullbuster challenge for a shot of $10,000.

2.title: Ladies First

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Eight new fierce females are invited to the ranch to take on three new challenges: Summit, Tired, and Excalibur. Later, one woman standing will take on the Skullbuster challenge, and a chance of $10,000.

3.title: The Last Face You See

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Eight new tough guys will take on Snatch, Barn Burner, and Loaded. Later, the last man standing will attempt the Skullbuster challenge for a shot of $10,000.

4.title: Big Girls Don't Cry

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Eight bad ass fierce female competitors take on Snatch, Barn Burner and Cranked on the ranch. Later, the woman standing victorious takes on the $10,000 Skullbuster challenge.

5.title: Gods of War

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Eight fierce and tough, bad-ass male athletes take on Trench Warfare, Loaded and Hard Labor. Later, one victorious competitor takes on the Skullbuster challenge, at a shot of $10,000.

6.title: Fallen on Hard Times

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Eight female athletes are invited to the ranch to prove their toughness against Trench Warfare, Loaded and Hard Labor. One woman earns to right to take on the Skullbuster to pocket $10,000.

7.title: Totally Ripped

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Eight tough male athletes take on Rip Off, Ass Kicker and Grip and Rip. Later, the last man remaining proves his toughness and earns the right to take on the Skullbuster for a chance at $10,000.

8.title: Mean Girls

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Eight new tough girls are invited to the ranch to take on Rip Off, Ass Kicker and Grip and Rip. The one woman left standing takes on the Skullbuster, and a shot of $10,000.

9.title: Put Up or Shut Up!

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: The last group of tough male athletes take on Drag Race, Ball Breaker and Splinter. The last man standing gets one final attempt at the Skullbuster, and a shot at $10,000.

10.title: Best for Last

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: In the second season finale, the last group of fierce female athletes take on Drag Race, Ball Breaker and Splinter. The last woman gets one last attempt at the Skullbuster and $10,000 up for grab.

1.title: Episode #3.1

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Steve Austin kicks off season three with eight badasses who will go head to head in three bust ass challenges. The last man standing will earn the right to take on the Skullbuster for a chance to win $10,000.

2.title: Special Delivery

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Steve Austin kicks off season three with eight elite female athletes. The last woman standing will take on Steve's toughest Skullbuster to date for a shot at $10,000.

3.title: Fighters Chance

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Eight tough-as-nails athletes are ready to throw down. But will they have what it takes to get through Trench Warfare, Pole Dancer and Chain Gang?

4.title: Flipping Out

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Eight rough and tough female athletes must face off in Trench Warfare, Pole Dancer and Chain Gang before they get a chance at the Skullbuster and a shot at $10,000 if they can beat the current benchmark time.

5.title: A Frog's Hair Away

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Eight male athletes compete in Summit, High & Dry and Cranked for a chance to win $10,000. Who will outlast his competition and challenge the toughest course in America?

6.title: High & Dry

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Eight new female competitors try and prove they are the toughest badass in the country by taking on Summit, High & Dry and Cranked. The winner moves on to face the Skullbuster and a chance at Steve Austin's $10,000.

7.title: Winners Never Quit

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Eight men come to the Broken Skull Ranch to battle one another in Rip Off, Loaded and Dead Weight. But will the last man standing defeat the Skullbuster and walk away with the $10,000?

8.title: Stars & Scraps

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Eight female military veterans battle in Rip Off, Loaded and Dead Weight. But only one will have a shot at the Skullbuster and a chance at $10,000.

9.title: Is There a New Sheriff in Town

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Eight male athletes tussle in Drag Race, Pile Up and Splinter. But only one man gets to take on the Skullbuster for a shot at $10,000.

10.title: You Gotta Dig Deep!

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Eight formidable female athletes compete in Drag Race, Pile Up and Splinter. One will earn the right to take on the Skullbuster for an opportunity to win $10,000.

11.title: Heavy Hitters

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Eight of the biggest athletes to ever step foot on the ranch battle it out in Possession, Bail Out and The Crate. But only one will survive to take on the Skullbuster for a shot at $10,000.

12.title: A Woman Possessed

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Eight female athletes are put to the test in Possession, Bail Out and The Crate. But only one will take on the Skullbuster for a chance to win $10,000.

13.title: King of the Hill

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Eight male athletes face off in The Summit, Barn Burner and Strapped. The winner moves on to the Skullbuster and a chance to win $10,000.

14.title: Strapped

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: Eight female athletes arrive at the ranch ready to throw down head-to-head in The Summit, Water Logged and Strapped. At the end of the day, only one will remain.

15.title: Guns N Hoses

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: Steve invites eight first responders to battle it out in Trench Warfare, High & Dry and Hard Labor. Only one will come out on top and take on the Skullbuster for a chance to win $10,000.

16.title: Labor Pain

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: Eight ferocious female athletes arrive at the ranch to do battle in Trench Warfare, High & Dry and Hard Labor. But only one will take on Steve's Skullbuster for a chance to win $10,000.

17.title: Shell Shocked

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: Eight male athletes arrive at the ranch to fight it out in Rip Off, Shock Wave and Dead Weight. Which one will outlast the rest and go on to face the Skullbuster for a shot at $10,000?

18.title: Finish Strong

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: Steve brings in his final eight female athletes to compete in Rip Off, Loaded and Pile Up. But only one is going to take on the Skullbuster for a chance to win $10,000.

1.title: Toughest Place in America

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Steve Austin begins season four with eight hardcore athletes going head to head in three rounds of grueling competition. The winner will have to beat the returning champion's benchmark time in order to walk away with $10,000.

2.title: The Girls Are Back in Town

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Steve Austin invites eight elite level women to compete on his ranch. But only one will get a shot at the new Skullbuster and chance to beat returning champion Cassidy's benchmark time and earn the $10,000 prize.

3.title: Last Man Smilin

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Steve Austin puts eight heavyweights through three rounds of competition in Drag Race, Trucked Up, and The Crate. One competitor will take on the Skullbuster for a chance at $10,000, but only if he can beat the benchmark time.

4.title: Down & Dirty

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Steve Austin invites eight female athletes to his ranch to go head-to-head in Drag Race, Trucked Up, and The Crate. Only one will stand tall in the end and take on Steve's Skullbuster for a chance at $10,000.

5.title: Broken Records

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Eight accomplished athletes will battle it out in Rip Off, Stoned, and Pole Dancer to determine who takes on Steve Austin's Skullbuster for a chance to win $10,000.

6.title: Take What's Yours

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: With $10,000 up for grabs, eight badass women go head to head in Rip Off, Stoned, and Pole Dancer to decide who takes on Steve Austin's Skullbuster.

7.title: The Hunter and the Hunted

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Eight fine-tuned athletes arrive at Steve Austin's ranch to compete in Snatch, High & Dry, and Rock Climb. One will emerge and earn a shot at Steve's Skullbuster and $10,000.

8.title: Leave with Your Head Held High

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Steve Austin challenges eight new female athletes with Snatch, High & Dry, and Rock Climb. In the end, one competitor will reign supreme and earn the right to take on Steve's Skullbuster for a shot at $10,000.

9.title: Best of the Best

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Eight of the toughest champions to have ever competed on the ranch return for another chance at victory. Two competitors will take on the Skullbuster, with the fastest time winning $25,000.

10.title: Redemption, Revenge, Regret

episode of.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: In the season finale, eight of the greatest female champions to have ever competed on the ranch return for another shot at glory. Two competitors will take on the Skullbuster, with the fastest time winning $25,000.

imdb.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
plot: A competition where ball-busters compete in challenges such as "The Nut Cracker" and "The Mud Bath" to reach the final challenge, "The Skull Buster".
